subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Doping (Sports)
organizations: Agence Francaise de Lutte contre le Dopage (AFLD)
lead_paragraph: The French Anti-Doping Agency and the International Cycling Union will work together again during the Paris-Nice race starting Sunday and look to extend their partnership at the Tour de France.
snippet: The French Anti-Doping Agency and the International Cycling Union will work together again during the Paris-Nice race starting Sunday and look to extend their partnership at the Tour de France.
